chapter.title: Testing Dektop applications
chapter.para: Demoiselle Behave Framework has a specific Runner for Desktop application (Swing) tests. This chapter talks about this subject. It should be noted that from version 1.6.0 the Demoiselle Behave starts using the AssertJ framework in substitution of Fest, which had the project discontinued in the community. The Fest runner is in the process of discontinuing and, in existing projects, it is recommended the replacement of it by the AssertJ runner.

section.title: Starting a project using Archetype (Project Model)
section.para: When you create a project it is possible to select archetype jbehave-assertj-archetype for having a fast beginning of a Desktop (Swing) test automation project.

section.title: Starting a project using an existing project (Project WebDriver)
section.para:
For changing an existing project into a functional Desktop test project it is enough to change runner and change appropriated settings.
Change runner dependency.
<dependency> <groupId>br.gov.frameworkdemoiselle.component.behave</groupId> <artifactId>demoiselle-behave-runner-assertj</artifactId> <version>1.x.x</version> <scope>test</scope> </dependency>
